item.title: Forget the salt: These 4 out-of-the-box tricks will make your food taste better
item.description:
Forget the salt: These 4 out-of-the-box tricks will make your food taste better

Oh no. You forgot to add the fresh ginger to the kung pao. Don't stress! Even if you forgot a key spice or sauce, you actually can make your food taste better - without adding a single ingredient.

item.title: 100 Stunning Picture Quotes That Will Supercharge Your Creativity
item.description:
100 Stunning Picture Quotes That Will Supercharge Your Creativity

Find your next favorite quote rendered in stunning graphic design.

item.title: There's brew love in a new lager saga: Daniel Noah Sheikh reinvents beer.
item.description:
There's brew love in a new lager saga: Daniel Noah Sheikh reinvents beer.

The crafting and consumption of artisanal ale has come to define hipsterdom as surely as unchecked facial hair and tattoos. Lager, once the fashionable brew, has been largely left out in the cold. One young MÃ¼nchner, though, is determined on rebuilding buzz around bold but bubbly Bavarian beer.

item.title: Techies Project by Photographer Helena Price
item.description:
Techies Project by Photographer Helena Price

The two words "Silicon Valley" immediately stir up stereotypes, stigma and maybe an HBO show. The name has become a cultural reflex, and that's what photographer Helena Price wants to change with her ambitious, large-scale portrait and interview series. Techies Project, launched today, is a collection of 100 in-depth interviews that breaks this idea of the "sameness" plaguing the area.

item.title: 7 Amazing Photos To Celebrate National Parks Week - Moment
item.description:
7 Amazing Photos To Celebrate National Parks Week - Moment

It's National Parks Week! This year is a big one to celebrate as the National Park Service celebrates its 100th birthday! That's 100 years of road trips out west, swimming in lakes, climbing mountains, sharing the roadways with roaming wildlife and camping with friends and family.
